reviewText:
I used to see Jack with Doc Watson,and saw Robert Bowlin in a duet concert. I'd heard Scott before so I knew if this was properly recorded it would be a good one.
Bowlin also played fiddle with Bill Monroe's band.
I've seen most the great guitar pickers in concert,from Clarence White ,Don Reno on down through the years. In my humble opinion Bowlin has ,so far,captured the essence of the tradition of flat picking best of anyone.
